titleStmt.title: Fortunes fashion pourtrayed in the troubles of the Ladie Elizabeth Gray, wife to Edward the fourth. Written by Tho. Sampson.
titleStmt.author: Sampson, Thomas, poet.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by R. Field] for William Iones, and are to be sold at his shop at White-crosse streete end by the church,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The troubles of the Lady Elizabeth Gray.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
